title: Championship Sunday recap
itunes:title: Championship Sunday recap
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, and Gregg Rosenthal – break down all the action from Championship Sunday starting with the Broncos who held off the Patriots on a late comeback drive to punch their ticket to Super Bowl 50, and a dominant performance from the Panthers, who routed the Cardinals 49-15 on their way to Santa Clara. Then, the heroes check in on their sandwich props from Thursday’s show, and quickly preview what’s to come in two weeks when the Broncos and the Panthers face off in the bay.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
